name: DJ Craze
description: '''DJ Craze''' (born '''Arist Delgado'''; November 19, 1977) is a [[Nicaraguan American]] DJ and record producer who plays [[hip hop music|hip hop]], [[Miami bass]], [[Trap music (EDM)|trap]], [[Breakbeat|breaks]], [[dubstep]], [[drum and bass]], and practices [[turntablism]]. He was, until 2020, the only solo DJ in history to win the [[DMC World DJ Championships]] trophy three times consecutively (1998â€“2000).
